conversations.body_text: Hi Francesco Mastrangelo,    I apologize for the delayed response. Here is your shipping tracking link. I noticed the order from the Haptics warehouse hasn't been shipped yet. We'll look into it and ship it out as soon as possible.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELS1514386037YQ,JSELW1584819818YQ

Salve il mio ordine non è ancora arrivato a che punto è? Quanto bisogna
ancora aspettare?
